description: I18n ProblemSteps:a.propertiesb=abcazhCN.propertiesb=\u8FD0\u884C\u6216\u8C03\u8BD5\u62A5\u8868 Java \u7A0B\u5E8FEclipse Locale:zhCNSystem Locale: en1.Create a new report2.Open Property Editor view, select report, select a in Resource File3.Create a bar chart4.Open chart builder, go to "Format Chart" tab, select Chart Area5.Title, click "..." button, tick "Externalize Text", Select Key :b6.Preview in htmlActual Results:1.The title is displayed as "abc"and URL: http://127.0.0.1:58190/viewer/run?report=C%3A%2FDocuments+and+Settings%2Fjmo%2Fworkspace10%2Fgg%2Fapple.rptdesign&format=html&svg=true&locale=null&designer=true&masterpage=truelocale is nullExpected Results:1.The title is displayed as Chinese
